text:
Am here the first time, impressed by the stall staff Ajib, always puts on a smile, Plesant, Friendly when he serves, v kind too, helped change my white rice to nasi lemak without additional cost; he also asked if I need soup, is definitely a wow service here 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
I give 10 thumbs up to this Ayam Penyet stall for the delicious Bakar Ayam with fresh veggie n cherry tomatoe & soup, at reasonable price of S$5.50 for a big chicken 🍗 drum stick.
The sambal is not too hot, the sauce for chicken is not salty (excellent 😃).

For atmosphere, I give 4 stars because the electricity frequently trip, make the ambient little warm; however here many seats, floor is cleaned n people here also friendly; feels like at home in kampong 😃❤️
Don’t eat there please. Food is mediocre and the man started mopping the floor all over you and you food starts tasting like the detergents he’s using.
New fruit stall with durian fruits and mangos on display was open recently in addition to the existing food stalls.
The mala is really yummy and and not so crowded just now when I buy food😂😂😂👍👍👍
Place is now partly open. Renovations ongoing one side.
